room_title: Escape room "Captain’s Quarters" by The Room Upstairs in Chicago
review: I had such an amazing time here! This was my first visit, and we did the Captains Quarters. It was both challenging and a ton of fun. We barely made it out of the room (it was only two of us), and it was so rewarding! The atmosphere and props were spot on. The challenges were both suitably difficult and entertaining. I recommend this to anyone who is looking for a true Escape Room experience. Ill be talking about this for years to come.

room_title: Escape room "Captain’s Quarters" by The Room Upstairs in Chicago
review: What a fun way to spend an evening with friends - the Captain's Quarters was a really fun challenge and the owners obviously really care about the experience - their pride and excitement was evident. Highly recommend The Room Upstairs!

room_title: Escape room "Captain’s Quarters" by The Room Upstairs in Chicago
review: The Pirate room was awesome! We loved it. So fun to work together with the family! It was challenging, but fun. We will definitely be back!
